casebody.data:
William Mark REIDENBACH, Plaintiff-Appellee/Cross-Appellant,
v.
CITY OF KALAMAZOO, Defendant-Appellant/Cross-Appellee. SC: 159592
COA: 340863 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 10, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee/cross-appellant to file a response to the brief amicus curiae submitted by the Michigan Self-Insurers Association is GRANTED.
